titleStmt.title: Some considerations on the proposal of the old East-India Company as it relates, I. To the new Company, and other subscribers to the two millions, to whom the trade was sold for a limited time. II. To the persons who are to subscribe to the new loan at 5 l. per cent. in case the proposal take effect. III. To the credit of the nation.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original at the Harvard University Library.
